mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_house ( fileseq, filename, fileExtension, filerealname, filesize, categoryCode, folderPath, id, ins_dt ) VALUES ( (SELECT ifnull(MAX(fileseq) + 1, 1) FROM file_house A), #{fileName}, #{fileExtension}, #{fileRealName}, #{fileSize}, #{categoryCode}, #{folderPath}, #{id}, sysdate() )

INSERT INTO file_folder ( folderSeq, folderName, id, upperFolder, folderDepth, ins_dt ) VALUES ( (SELECT ifnull(MAX(folderSeq) + 1, 1) FROM file_folder A), #{folderName}, #{id}, #{upperFolder}, #{folderDepth}, sysdate() )
